pages.text:
Since it is a crystal cube and not a crystal ball, it does not show the future, but the present.
The &1Corporea Crystal Cube&0 acts as a visual medium to interact ith one's &4Corporea Network&0.

Place a $(l:1_items/spark)&1Croporea Spark&0$(/l) on top of the cube to hook it up to a network.
Right clicking it with any sort of item will have it monitor that item, allowing someone who's looking at it see how many exist in the network.
Left clicking the block will request one of that item from the network. Shift-left clicking requests a whole stack.

The &1Corporea Crystal Cube&0 can be used alongside a &1Redstone Comparator&0.
This will output the amount of items of the type it's looking for in the system.
However, the growth is logarithmic, meaning that each redstone level requires twice as many items as the previous one.
